review: Great device! Defitnley worth a buy.
author: gabriel yamasaki

review: It doesn't work at all like all the rave and reviews.  Most of the movies I try and watch simply state No Streaming, or the ones that I do get to watch can't complete watching them because they stop  playing and won't start back again. I checked all the hookups and WiFi as well and everything is in working order. Oh and I have not seen anything on HBO GO.
author: ELIZABETH OLMOS

review: It's a good deal for the Amazon Prime price.I do wish Sime of the apps were better to subscribe too.
author: pandy515

review: Great product! Easy to setup and already configured to my Amazon account. No need for the power adapter if you have a recent TV with a USB port which will supply power. A big plus since we had to plug the Fire TV Stick behind the TV is it uses RF versus IR signal so there is no need for a direct line-of-site to use the remote.
author: Donny Saengkio

review: Meets All my expectations!Have it for my bedroom with sling tv, Netflix and HBO go on it.
author: Steve Mercadante

review: Has a noticeable lag compared to fire TV. A little bit slower than I expected but still gets everything done and is a great device.
author: Jordan

review: Works great. Easy to use interface.
author: shopperK
